author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe is tied together by the recurring appearances of fan-favorite characters and the actors that portray them. As with most overlarge franchises, however, there have been recasts over the years. Now it looks like Marvel Studios made the decision to recast another MCU character for an upcoming project. Several MCU projects are [...]

The post Marvel Studios Recasts Beloved MCU Character appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Marvel Studios Recasts Beloved MCU Character
